description: I apply a 1/2” bead of adhesive to the joists then slowly lower the panel. I use 3/4” (23/32) tongue and groove plywood along with 2” screws to make this installation as strong as possible 👍🏽🔥#carpentry #bathroomremodel #homerenovation
title: How to Install a Plywood Shower Floor - #shorts #homerepairtutor
